metadata.titleEn: Chronological and environmental index data set of Wenchuan  loess profile in Western Sichuan Plateau
metadata.titleCn: 川西高原汶川黄土剖面的年代和环境指标数据集
metadata.description: This data is the chronological, grain size and bulk density data of loess-paleosol sequence in Wenchuan (WCH) in the eastern Tibetan Plateau. We measured the median grain size and bulk density data of the profile (10m) at intervals of 2.5cm and 5cm respectively. The OSL dating experiment was carried out in the Luminescence Dating Laboratory of the Key Laboratory of Western China’s Environmental Systems (Ministry of Education) in Lanzhou University. AMS 14C measurements  were carried out at Peking University. The experimental analysis of environmental indicators was also completed at the Key Laboratory of Western China’s Environmental Systems (Ministry of Education) in Lanzhou University. The OSL ages were determined by an automated Risø TL/OSL DA-20 reader. The grain size data were measured by a Malvern Mastersizer 2000 laser diffractometer; the bulk density data were determined by the oil-soaked method. This data provides the detailed chronological data of loess-paleosol sequence and the variation characteristics of grain size and bulk density since the last glacial period in the eastern Tibetan Plateau, and provides an important data reference for understanding paleoclimate evolution and dust accumulation history in the eastern Tibetan Plateau.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据为青藏高原东部汶川（WCH）黄土-古土壤序列的年代数据、粒度数据和容重数据。我们分别按照2.5-5 cm间隔测量该剖面（10 m）的粒度和容重数据。所有光释光年代、粒度、容重测定都在兰州大学西部环境重点实验室完成。所有AMS14C定年样品都在北京大学完成测试。光释光年代测试使用Risø TL/OSL DA-20型释光分析仪；粒度数据使用Malvern Mastersizer 2000激光粒度仪测定；容重数据使用油浸法测定；该数据提供了青藏高原东部地区末次冰期以来的黄土-古土壤序列的详细年代学数据以及粒度和容重变化特征，为认识青藏高原东部地区青藏高原东部黄土古环境、古气候研究、粉尘积累历史提供了重要数据参考。
metadata.instructions: The chronology data , grain size data and bulk density data of Wenchuan (WCH) section are stored in CSV format. The names of the files are "chronology data of WCH section" and "grain size and bulk density data of WCH section". The data sheet can be viewed and edited with Excel software in Microsoft office
metadata.instructionsCn: 汶川（WCH）剖面的年代数据、粒度数据和容重数据以CSV格式存储，文件的名称为“Chronology data of WCH Section”和“Grain size and bulk density data of WCH section”。该数据表可以可用Microsoft Office中的Excel软件进行查看和编辑

literatureList.titleEn: Chronology and dust mass accumulation history of the Wenchuan loess on eastern Tibetan Plateau since the last glacial.
literatureList.referenceEn: Liu, L., Yang, S., Cheng, T., Liu, X., Luo, Y., Liu, N., Chen, H., Chen, Z., Li, P., & Liu, W. (2021). Chronology and dust mass accumulation history of the Wenchuan loess on eastern Tibetan Plateau since the last glacial. Aeolian Research 53, 100748.

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to obtain chronological and environmental indicators in loess-soil sequences on the eastern Tibetan Plateau?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据收集方法的例子，用于获取东藏高原黄土土壤序列中的时间和环境指标？
Example.AnswerEn: One data collection method involves measuring grain size and bulk density at intervals of 2.5-5 cm over a 10-meter section of loess-soil sequences. Chronological data is obtained through optically stimulated luminescence dating using a Risø TL/OSL DA-20 luminescence analyzer, while grain size is measured with a Malvern Mastersizer 2000 laser particle size analyzer, and bulk density is determined using the oil immersion method. Additionally, AMS14C dating is conducted at Peking University.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种数据收集方法涉及在10米长的黄土土壤序列中，每隔2.5-5厘米测量颗粒大小和体积密度。通过使用Risø TL/OSL DA-20光释光分析仪获得的时间数据，颗粒大小使用Malvern Mastersizer 2000激光粒度分析仪测量，体积密度则采用油浸法确定。此外，放射性碳-14（AMS14C）测年在北京大学进行。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific characteristics and methods used for measuring grain size and bulk density in a dataset related to loess-soil sequences on the eastern Qinghai-Tibet Plateau?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在与青藏高原东部黄土土壤序列相关的数据集中，测量颗粒大小和体积密度的具体特征和方法是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: Grain size measured using Malvern Mastersizer 2000 laser particle size analyzer, bulk density determined by oil immersion method, measurements at intervals of 2.5-5 cm for a 10-meter profile
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 使用马尔文Mastersizer 2000激光粒度分析仪测量的颗粒大小，采用油浸法测定的堆积密度，测量间隔为2.5-5厘米，适用于10米的剖面。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the interval measurement used for grain size and bulk density data collection in the loess-soil sequence dataset from the eastern Tibetan Plateau?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在东藏高原的黄土土壤序列数据集中，颗粒大小和体积密度数据收集的间隔测量是什么？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of using optical stimulated luminescence in determining the age of loess-paleosol sequences?
Definition.QuestionCn: 使用光刺激发光技术确定黄土-古土壤序列年龄的意义是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Optical stimulated luminescence (OSL) is used to determine the age of loess-paleosol sequences by measuring the last time mineral grains were exposed to sunlight. In this domain, OSL dating provides detailed chronological data for the loess-paleosol sequences from the Tibetan Plateau region since the Last Glacial Period.
Definition.AnswerCn: 光刺激发光（OSL）用于通过测量矿物颗粒最后一次暴露于阳光的时间来确定黄土-古土壤序列的年龄。在这一领域，OSL 定年为青藏 Plateau地区自上一个冰川时期以来的黄土-古土壤序列提供了详细的年代学数据。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the choice of specific measurement intervals, such as 2.5-5 cm, when collecting soil profile data in regions like the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在像青藏高原这样的地区收集土壤剖面数据时，选择特定测量间隔（如2.5-5厘米）的因素包括哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The choice of specific measurement intervals, such as 2.5-5 cm, is influenced by the need for detailed resolution in capturing variations in grain size and bulk density within the loess-soil sequences. This high-resolution approach allows researchers to accurately track changes over the last glacial period and understand the environmental and climatic history of the eastern Tibetan Plateau.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 特定测量间隔的选择，如2.5-5厘米，受到需要详细分辨率以捕捉黄土-土壤序列中颗粒大小和体积密度变化的影响。这种高分辨率的方法使研究人员能够准确追踪最后冰川期的变化，并理解东藏高原的环境和气候历史。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it necessary to collect detailed chronological and environmental indicator data from loess-paleosol sequences on the eastern Tibetan Plateau?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 为什么有必要收集来自东藏高原黄土-古土壤序列的详细时间顺序和环境指标数据？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Collecting detailed chronological and environmental indicator data from loess-paleosol sequences on the eastern Tibetan Plateau provides important data reference for understanding the historical dust accumulation, paleoenvironments, and paleoclimate research in the region since the last glacial period.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 收集东藏高原黄土-古土壤序列的详细时间顺序和环境指标数据，为理解自上一个冰川期以来该地区的历史尘埃积累、古环境和古气候研究提供了重要的数据参考。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the methodological steps involved in measuring grain size and bulk density for loess-paleosol sequences in the context of Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau research?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原研究中，测量黄土-古土壤序列的粒度和体积密度涉及哪些方法步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Grain size and bulk density for loess-paleosol sequences are measured at intervals of 2.5-5 cm using specific laboratory equipment. Grain size is determined using a Malvern Mastersizer 2000 laser particle sizer, while bulk density is measured using the oil immersion method. These measurements are conducted to provide detailed chronological data and to analyze the variations in grain size and bulk density characteristics since the last glacial period.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 黄土-古土壤序列的粒度和体积密度在2.5-5厘米的间隔内使用特定的实验室设备进行测量。粒度通过Malvern Mastersizer 2000激光粒度分析仪确定，而体积密度则采用油浸法进行测量。这些测量旨在提供详细的年代数据，并分析自上一个冰川时期以来粒度和体积密度特征的变化。
